page.title: 12TRANSPORT.
page.content: Not so many families travel on{buses now because they have{cars.}Teenagers{ use{motorbikes}and mopeds. Children use {bicycles}for transport and some people use them for excercise. Because of this Eastern National have just brought out a new kind of transport called{country cars}which are 6 seater Peugeot Estate cars. They start at Stones Green and go to Colchester through the villages and back. There are six{bus routes}running through Gt. Oakley they are the 80,80a,80b,104,106 and the 126.Buses go to Clacton, Hawich, Colchester and Mannintree. The {return fare}to Colchester is Â£2.40.
